23namespace libyuv {

25#endif
26
27#define SUBSAMPLE(v, a, s) (v < 0) ? (-((-v + a) >> s)) : ((v + a) >> s)
28static __inline int Abs(int v) {
29 return v >= 0 ? v : -v;
30}
31
32// I420 To any I4xx YUV format with mirroring.
33// TODO(fbarchard): Consider kFilterNone for Y, or CopyPlane
34
35static int I420ToI4xx(const uint8_t* src_y,
36 int src_stride_y,
37 const uint8_t* src_u,
38 int src_stride_u,
39 const uint8_t* src_v,
40 int src_stride_v,
41 uint8_t* dst_y,
42 int dst_stride_y,
43 uint8_t* dst_u,
44 int dst_stride_u,
45 uint8_t* dst_v,
46 int dst_stride_v,
47 int src_y_width,
48 int src_y_height,
49 int dst_uv_width,
50 int dst_uv_height) {
51 const int dst_y_width = Abs(src_y_width);
52 const int dst_y_height = Abs(src_y_height);
53 const int src_uv_width = SUBSAMPLE(src_y_width, 1, 1);
54 const int src_uv_height = SUBSAMPLE(src_y_height, 1, 1);
55 if (src_y_width == 0 || src_y_height == 0 || dst_uv_width <= 0 ||
56 dst_uv_height <= 0) {
57 return -1;
58 }
59 if (dst_y) {
60 ScalePlane(src_y, src_stride_y, src_y_width, src_y_height, dst_y,
61 dst_stride_y, dst_y_width, dst_y_height, kFilterBilinear);
62 }
63 ScalePlane(src_u, src_stride_u, src_uv_width, src_uv_height, dst_u,
64 dst_stride_u, dst_uv_width, dst_uv_height, kFilterBilinear);
65 ScalePlane(src_v, src_stride_v, src_uv_width, src_uv_height, dst_v,
66 dst_stride_v, dst_uv_width, dst_uv_height, kFilterBilinear);
67 return 0;
68}
69
70// Convert 8 bit YUV to 10 bit.
71LIBYUV_API
72int I420ToI010(const uint8_t* src_y,
73 int src_stride_y,
74 const uint8_t* src_u,
75 int src_stride_u,
76 const uint8_t* src_v,
77 int src_stride_v,
78 uint16_t* dst_y,
79 int dst_stride_y,
80 uint16_t* dst_u,
81 int dst_stride_u,
82 uint16_t* dst_v,
83 int dst_stride_v,
84 int width,
85 int height) {
86 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
87 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
88 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
89 return -1;
90 }
91 // Negative height means invert the image.
92 if (height < 0) {
93 height = -height;
94 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
95 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
96 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
97 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
98 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
99 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
100 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
101 }
102
103 // Convert Y plane.
104 Convert8To16Plane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, 1024, width,
105 height);
106 // Convert UV planes.
107 Convert8To16Plane(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, 1024, halfwidth,
108 halfheight);
109 Convert8To16Plane(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, 1024, halfwidth,
110 halfheight);
111 return 0;
112}
113
114// Convert 8 bit YUV to 12 bit.
115LIBYUV_API
116int I420ToI012(const uint8_t* src_y,
117 int src_stride_y,
118 const uint8_t* src_u,
119 int src_stride_u,
120 const uint8_t* src_v,
121 int src_stride_v,
122 uint16_t* dst_y,
123 int dst_stride_y,
124 uint16_t* dst_u,
125 int dst_stride_u,
126 uint16_t* dst_v,
127 int dst_stride_v,
128 int width,
129 int height) {
130 int halfwidth = (width + 1) >> 1;
131 int halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
132 if (!src_u || !src_v || !dst_u || !dst_v || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
133 return -1;
134 }
135 // Negative height means invert the image.
136 if (height < 0) {
137 height = -height;
138 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
139 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
140 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
141 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
142 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
143 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
144 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
145 }
146
147 // Convert Y plane.
148 Convert8To16Plane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, 4096, width,
149 height);
150 // Convert UV planes.
151 Convert8To16Plane(src_u, src_stride_u, dst_u, dst_stride_u, 4096, halfwidth,
152 halfheight);
153 Convert8To16Plane(src_v, src_stride_v, dst_v, dst_stride_v, 4096, halfwidth,
154 halfheight);
155 return 0;
156}
157
158// 420 chroma is 1/2 width, 1/2 height
159// 422 chroma is 1/2 width, 1x height
160LIBYUV_API
161int I420ToI422(const uint8_t* src_y,
162 int src_stride_y,
163 const uint8_t* src_u,
164 int src_stride_u,
165 const uint8_t* src_v,
166 int src_stride_v,
167 uint8_t* dst_y,
168 int dst_stride_y,
169 uint8_t* dst_u,
170 int dst_stride_u,
171 uint8_t* dst_v,
172 int dst_stride_v,
173 int width,
174 int height) {
175 const int dst_uv_width = (Abs(width) + 1) >> 1;
176 const int dst_uv_height = Abs(height);
177 return I420ToI4xx(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_stride_u, src_v,
178 src_stride_v, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_u, dst_stride_u,
179 dst_v, dst_stride_v, width, height, dst_uv_width,
180 dst_uv_height);
181}
182
183// 420 chroma is 1/2 width, 1/2 height
184// 444 chroma is 1x width, 1x height
185LIBYUV_API
186int I420ToI444(const uint8_t* src_y,
187 int src_stride_y,
188 const uint8_t* src_u,
189 int src_stride_u,
190 const uint8_t* src_v,
191 int src_stride_v,
192 uint8_t* dst_y,
193 int dst_stride_y,
194 uint8_t* dst_u,
195 int dst_stride_u,
196 uint8_t* dst_v,
197 int dst_stride_v,
198 int width,
199 int height) {
200 const int dst_uv_width = Abs(width);
201 const int dst_uv_height = Abs(height);
202 return I420ToI4xx(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_stride_u, src_v,
203 src_stride_v, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_u, dst_stride_u,
204 dst_v, dst_stride_v, width, height, dst_uv_width,
205 dst_uv_height);
206}
207
208// 420 chroma to 444 chroma, 10/12 bit version
209LIBYUV_API
210int I010ToI410(const uint16_t* src_y,
211 int src_stride_y,
212 const uint16_t* src_u,
213 int src_stride_u,
214 const uint16_t* src_v,
215 int src_stride_v,
216 uint16_t* dst_y,
217 int dst_stride_y,
218 uint16_t* dst_u,
219 int dst_stride_u,
220 uint16_t* dst_v,
221 int dst_stride_v,
222 int width,
223 int height) {
224 if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
225 return -1;
226 }
227
228 if (dst_y) {
229 ScalePlane_12(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
230 Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
231 }
232 ScalePlane_12(src_u, src_stride_u, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1),
233 SUBSAMPLE(height, 1, 1), dst_u, dst_stride_u, Abs(width),
234 Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
235 ScalePlane_12(src_v, src_stride_v, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1),
236 SUBSAMPLE(height, 1, 1), dst_v, dst_stride_v, Abs(width),
237 Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
238 return 0;
239}
240
241// 422 chroma to 444 chroma, 10/12 bit version
242LIBYUV_API
243int I210ToI410(const uint16_t* src_y,
244 int src_stride_y,
245 const uint16_t* src_u,
246 int src_stride_u,
247 const uint16_t* src_v,
248 int src_stride_v,
249 uint16_t* dst_y,
250 int dst_stride_y,
251 uint16_t* dst_u,
252 int dst_stride_u,
253 uint16_t* dst_v,
254 int dst_stride_v,
255 int width,
256 int height) {
257 if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
258 return -1;
259 }
260
261 if (dst_y) {
262 ScalePlane_12(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
263 Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
264 }
265 ScalePlane_12(src_u, src_stride_u, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1), height, dst_u,
266 dst_stride_u, Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
267 ScalePlane_12(src_v, src_stride_v, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1), height, dst_v,
268 dst_stride_v, Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
269 return 0;
270}
271
272// 422 chroma is 1/2 width, 1x height
273// 444 chroma is 1x width, 1x height
274LIBYUV_API
275int I422ToI444(const uint8_t* src_y,
276 int src_stride_y,
277 const uint8_t* src_u,
278 int src_stride_u,
279 const uint8_t* src_v,
280 int src_stride_v,
281 uint8_t* dst_y,
282 int dst_stride_y,
283 uint8_t* dst_u,
284 int dst_stride_u,
285 uint8_t* dst_v,
286 int dst_stride_v,
287 int width,
288 int height) {
289 if (width == 0 || height == 0) {
290 return -1;
291 }
292
293 if (dst_y) {
294 ScalePlane(src_y, src_stride_y, width, height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
295 Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
296 }
297 ScalePlane(src_u, src_stride_u, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1), height, dst_u,
298 dst_stride_u, Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
299 ScalePlane(src_v, src_stride_v, SUBSAMPLE(width, 1, 1), height, dst_v,
300 dst_stride_v, Abs(width), Abs(height), kFilterBilinear);
301 return 0;
302}
303
304// Copy to I400. Source can be I420,422,444,400,NV12,NV21
305LIBYUV_API
306int I400Copy(const uint8_t* src_y,
307 int src_stride_y,
308 uint8_t* dst_y,
309 int dst_stride_y,
310 int width,
311 int height) {
312 if (!src_y || !dst_y || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
313 return -1;
314 }
315 // Negative height means invert the image.
316 if (height < 0) {
317 height = -height;
318 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
319 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
320 }
321 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
322 return 0;
323}
324
325LIBYUV_API
326int I422ToYUY2(const uint8_t* src_y,
327 int src_stride_y,
328 const uint8_t* src_u,
329 int src_stride_u,
330 const uint8_t* src_v,
331 int src_stride_v,
332 uint8_t* dst_yuy2,
333 int dst_stride_yuy2,
334 int width,
335 int height) {
336 int y;
337 void (*I422ToYUY2Row)(const uint8_t* src_y, const uint8_t* src_u,
338 const uint8_t* src_v, uint8_t* dst_yuy2, int width) =
339 I422ToYUY2Row_C;
340 if (!src_y || !src_u || !src_v || !dst_yuy2 || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
341 return -1;
342 }
343 // Negative height means invert the image.
344 if (height < 0) {
345 height = -height;
346 dst_yuy2 = dst_yuy2 + (height - 1) * dst_stride_yuy2;
347 dst_stride_yuy2 = -dst_stride_yuy2;
348 }
349 // Coalesce rows.
350 if (src_stride_y == width && src_stride_u * 2 == width &&
351 src_stride_v * 2 == width && dst_stride_yuy2 == width * 2) {
352 width *= height;
353 height = 1;
354 src_stride_y = src_stride_u = src_stride_v = dst_stride_yuy2 = 0;
355 }
356#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_SSE2)
357 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
358 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_SSE2;
359 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
360 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_SSE2;
361 }
362 }
363#endif
364#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_AVX2)
365 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
366 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_AVX2;
367 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
368 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_AVX2;
369 }
370 }
371#endif
372#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_NEON)
373 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
374 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_NEON;
375 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
376 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_NEON;
377 }
378 }
379#endif
380
381 for (y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
382 I422ToYUY2Row(src_y, src_u, src_v, dst_yuy2, width);
383 src_y += src_stride_y;
384 src_u += src_stride_u;
385 src_v += src_stride_v;
386 dst_yuy2 += dst_stride_yuy2;
387 }
388 return 0;
389}
390
391LIBYUV_API
392int I420ToYUY2(const uint8_t* src_y,
393 int src_stride_y,
394 const uint8_t* src_u,
395 int src_stride_u,
396 const uint8_t* src_v,
397 int src_stride_v,
398 uint8_t* dst_yuy2,
399 int dst_stride_yuy2,
400 int width,
401 int height) {
402 int y;
403 void (*I422ToYUY2Row)(const uint8_t* src_y, const uint8_t* src_u,
404 const uint8_t* src_v, uint8_t* dst_yuy2, int width) =
405 I422ToYUY2Row_C;
406 if (!src_y || !src_u || !src_v || !dst_yuy2 || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
407 return -1;
408 }
409 // Negative height means invert the image.
410 if (height < 0) {
411 height = -height;
412 dst_yuy2 = dst_yuy2 + (height - 1) * dst_stride_yuy2;
413 dst_stride_yuy2 = -dst_stride_yuy2;
414 }
415#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_SSE2)
416 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
417 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_SSE2;
418 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
419 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_SSE2;
420 }
421 }
422#endif
423#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_AVX2)
424 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
425 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_AVX2;
426 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
427 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_AVX2;
428 }
429 }
430#endif
431#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_NEON)
432 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
433 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_NEON;
434 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
435 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_NEON;
436 }
437 }
438#endif
439#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_MMI)
440 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
441 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_MMI;
442 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
443 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_MMI;
444 }
445 }
446#endif
447#if defined(HAS_I422TOYUY2ROW_MSA)
448 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
449 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_Any_MSA;
450 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
451 I422ToYUY2Row = I422ToYUY2Row_MSA;
452 }
453 }
454#endif
455
456 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
457 I422ToYUY2Row(src_y, src_u, src_v, dst_yuy2, width);
458 I422ToYUY2Row(src_y + src_stride_y, src_u, src_v,
459 dst_yuy2 + dst_stride_yuy2, width);
460 src_y += src_stride_y * 2;
461 src_u += src_stride_u;
462 src_v += src_stride_v;
463 dst_yuy2 += dst_stride_yuy2 * 2;
464 }
465 if (height & 1) {
466 I422ToYUY2Row(src_y, src_u, src_v, dst_yuy2, width);
467 }
468 return 0;
469}
470
471LIBYUV_API
472int I422ToUYVY(const uint8_t* src_y,
473 int src_stride_y,
474 const uint8_t* src_u,
475 int src_stride_u,
476 const uint8_t* src_v,
477 int src_stride_v,
478 uint8_t* dst_uyvy,
479 int dst_stride_uyvy,
480 int width,
481 int height) {
482 int y;
483 void (*I422ToUYVYRow)(const uint8_t* src_y, const uint8_t* src_u,
484 const uint8_t* src_v, uint8_t* dst_uyvy, int width) =
485 I422ToUYVYRow_C;
486 if (!src_y || !src_u || !src_v || !dst_uyvy || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
487 return -1;
488 }
489 // Negative height means invert the image.
490 if (height < 0) {
491 height = -height;
492 dst_uyvy = dst_uyvy + (height - 1) * dst_stride_uyvy;
493 dst_stride_uyvy = -dst_stride_uyvy;
494 }
495 // Coalesce rows.
496 if (src_stride_y == width && src_stride_u * 2 == width &&
497 src_stride_v * 2 == width && dst_stride_uyvy == width * 2) {
498 width *= height;
499 height = 1;
500 src_stride_y = src_stride_u = src_stride_v = dst_stride_uyvy = 0;
501 }
502#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_SSE2)
503 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
504 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_SSE2;
505 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
506 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_SSE2;
507 }
508 }
509#endif
510#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_AVX2)
511 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
512 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_AVX2;
513 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
514 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_AVX2;
515 }
516 }
517#endif
518#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_NEON)
519 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
520 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_NEON;
521 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
522 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_NEON;
523 }
524 }
525#endif
526#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_MMI)
527 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
528 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_MMI;
529 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
530 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_MMI;
531 }
532 }
533#endif
534#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_MSA)
535 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
536 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_MSA;
537 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
538 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_MSA;
539 }
540 }
541#endif
542
543 for (y = 0; y < height; ++y) {
544 I422ToUYVYRow(src_y, src_u, src_v, dst_uyvy, width);
545 src_y += src_stride_y;
546 src_u += src_stride_u;
547 src_v += src_stride_v;
548 dst_uyvy += dst_stride_uyvy;
549 }
550 return 0;
551}
552
553LIBYUV_API
554int I420ToUYVY(const uint8_t* src_y,
555 int src_stride_y,
556 const uint8_t* src_u,
557 int src_stride_u,
558 const uint8_t* src_v,
559 int src_stride_v,
560 uint8_t* dst_uyvy,
561 int dst_stride_uyvy,
562 int width,
563 int height) {
564 int y;
565 void (*I422ToUYVYRow)(const uint8_t* src_y, const uint8_t* src_u,
566 const uint8_t* src_v, uint8_t* dst_uyvy, int width) =
567 I422ToUYVYRow_C;
568 if (!src_y || !src_u || !src_v || !dst_uyvy || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
569 return -1;
570 }
571 // Negative height means invert the image.
572 if (height < 0) {
573 height = -height;
574 dst_uyvy = dst_uyvy + (height - 1) * dst_stride_uyvy;
575 dst_stride_uyvy = -dst_stride_uyvy;
576 }
577#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_SSE2)
578 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasSSE2)) {
579 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_SSE2;
580 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
581 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_SSE2;
582 }
583 }
584#endif
585#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_AVX2)
586 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasAVX2)) {
587 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_AVX2;
588 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
589 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_AVX2;
590 }
591 }
592#endif
593#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_NEON)
594 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasNEON)) {
595 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_NEON;
596 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 16)) {
597 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_NEON;
598 }
599 }
600#endif
601#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_MMI)
602 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMMI)) {
603 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_MMI;
604 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 8)) {
605 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_MMI;
606 }
607 }
608#endif
609#if defined(HAS_I422TOUYVYROW_MSA)
610 if (TestCpuFlag(kCpuHasMSA)) {
611 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_Any_MSA;
612 if (IS_ALIGNED(width, 32)) {
613 I422ToUYVYRow = I422ToUYVYRow_MSA;
614 }
615 }
616#endif
617
618 for (y = 0; y < height - 1; y += 2) {
619 I422ToUYVYRow(src_y, src_u, src_v, dst_uyvy, width);
620 I422ToUYVYRow(src_y + src_stride_y, src_u, src_v,
621 dst_uyvy + dst_stride_uyvy, width);
622 src_y += src_stride_y * 2;
623 src_u += src_stride_u;
624 src_v += src_stride_v;
625 dst_uyvy += dst_stride_uyvy * 2;
626 }
627 if (height & 1) {
628 I422ToUYVYRow(src_y, src_u, src_v, dst_uyvy, width);
629 }
630 return 0;
631}
632
633LIBYUV_API
634int I420ToNV12(const uint8_t* src_y,
635 int src_stride_y,
636 const uint8_t* src_u,
637 int src_stride_u,
638 const uint8_t* src_v,
639 int src_stride_v,
640 uint8_t* dst_y,
641 int dst_stride_y,
642 uint8_t* dst_uv,
643 int dst_stride_uv,
644 int width,
645 int height) {
646 int halfwidth = (width + 1) / 2;
647 int halfheight = (height + 1) / 2;
648 if (!src_y || !src_u || !src_v || !dst_y || !dst_uv || width <= 0 ||
649 height == 0) {
650 return -1;
651 }
652 // Negative height means invert the image.
653 if (height < 0) {
654 height = -height;
655 halfheight = (height + 1) >> 1;
656 src_y = src_y + (height - 1) * src_stride_y;
657 src_u = src_u + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_u;
658 src_v = src_v + (halfheight - 1) * src_stride_v;
659 src_stride_y = -src_stride_y;
660 src_stride_u = -src_stride_u;
661 src_stride_v = -src_stride_v;
662 }
663 if (dst_y) {
664 CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, width, height);
665 }
666 MergeUVPlane(src_u, src_stride_u, src_v, src_stride_v, dst_uv, dst_stride_uv,
667 halfwidth, halfheight);
668 return 0;
669}
670
671LIBYUV_API
672int I420ToNV21(const uint8_t* src_y,
673 int src_stride_y,
674 const uint8_t* src_u,
675 int src_stride_u,
676 const uint8_t* src_v,
677 int src_stride_v,
678 uint8_t* dst_y,
679 int dst_stride_y,
680 uint8_t* dst_vu,
681 int dst_stride_vu,
682 int width,
683 int height) {
684 return I420ToNV12(src_y, src_stride_y, src_v, src_stride_v, src_u,
685 src_stride_u, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_vu, dst_stride_vu,
686 width, height);
687}
688
689// Convert I420 to specified format
690LIBYUV_API
691int ConvertFromI420(const uint8_t* y,
692 int y_stride,
693 const uint8_t* u,
694 int u_stride,
695 const uint8_t* v,
696 int v_stride,
697 uint8_t* dst_sample,
698 int dst_sample_stride,
699 int width,
700 int height,
701 uint32_t fourcc) {
702 uint32_t format = CanonicalFourCC(fourcc);
703 int r = 0;
704 if (!y || !u || !v || !dst_sample || width <= 0 || height == 0) {
705 return -1;
706 }
707 switch (format) {
708 // Single plane formats
709 case FOURCC_YUY2:
710 r = I420ToYUY2(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
711 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 2, width,
712 height);
713 break;
714 case FOURCC_UYVY:
715 r = I420ToUYVY(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
716 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 2, width,
717 height);
718 break;
719 case FOURCC_RGBP:
720 r = I420ToRGB565(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
721 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 2, width,
722 height);
723 break;
724 case FOURCC_RGBO:
725 r = I420ToARGB1555(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
726 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 2,
727 width, height);
728 break;
729 case FOURCC_R444:
730 r = I420ToARGB4444(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
731 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 2,
732 width, height);
733 break;
734 case FOURCC_24BG:
735 r = I420ToRGB24(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
736 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 3, width,
737 height);
738 break;
739 case FOURCC_RAW:
740 r = I420ToRAW(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
741 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 3, width,
742 height);
743 break;
744 case FOURCC_ARGB:
745 r = I420ToARGB(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
746 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 4, width,
747 height);
748 break;
749 case FOURCC_BGRA:
750 r = I420ToBGRA(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
751 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 4, width,
752 height);
753 break;
754 case FOURCC_ABGR:
755 r = I420ToABGR(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
756 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 4, width,
757 height);
758 break;
759 case FOURCC_RGBA:
760 r = I420ToRGBA(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
761 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 4, width,
762 height);
763 break;
764 case FOURCC_AR30:
765 r = I420ToAR30(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
766 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width * 4, width,
767 height);
768 break;
769 case FOURCC_I400:
770 r = I400Copy(y, y_stride, dst_sample,
771 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width, width,
772 height);
773 break;
774 case FOURCC_NV12: {
775 uint8_t* dst_uv = dst_sample + width * height;
776 r = I420ToNV12(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
777 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width, dst_uv,
778 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width, width,
779 height);
780 break;
781 }
782 case FOURCC_NV21: {
783 uint8_t* dst_vu = dst_sample + width * height;
784 r = I420ToNV21(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
785 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width, dst_vu,
786 dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width, width,
787 height);
788 break;
789 }
790 // Triplanar formats
791 case FOURCC_I420:
792 case FOURCC_YV12: {
793 dst_sample_stride = dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width;
794 int halfstride = (dst_sample_stride + 1) / 2;
795 int halfheight = (height + 1) / 2;
796 uint8_t* dst_u;
797 uint8_t* dst_v;
798 if (format == FOURCC_YV12) {
799 dst_v = dst_sample + dst_sample_stride * height;
800 dst_u = dst_v + halfstride * halfheight;
801 } else {
802 dst_u = dst_sample + dst_sample_stride * height;
803 dst_v = dst_u + halfstride * halfheight;
804 }
805 r = I420Copy(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
806 dst_sample_stride, dst_u, halfstride, dst_v, halfstride,
807 width, height);
808 break;
809 }
810 case FOURCC_I422:
811 case FOURCC_YV16: {
812 dst_sample_stride = dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width;
813 int halfstride = (dst_sample_stride + 1) / 2;
814 uint8_t* dst_u;
815 uint8_t* dst_v;
816 if (format == FOURCC_YV16) {
817 dst_v = dst_sample + dst_sample_stride * height;
818 dst_u = dst_v + halfstride * height;
819 } else {
820 dst_u = dst_sample + dst_sample_stride * height;
821 dst_v = dst_u + halfstride * height;
822 }
823 r = I420ToI422(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
824 dst_sample_stride, dst_u, halfstride, dst_v, halfstride,
825 width, height);
826 break;
827 }
828 case FOURCC_I444:
829 case FOURCC_YV24: {
830 dst_sample_stride = dst_sample_stride ? dst_sample_stride : width;
831 uint8_t* dst_u;
832 uint8_t* dst_v;
833 if (format == FOURCC_YV24) {
834 dst_v = dst_sample + dst_sample_stride * height;
835 dst_u = dst_v + dst_sample_stride * height;
836 } else {
837 dst_u = dst_sample + dst_sample_stride * height;
838 dst_v = dst_u + dst_sample_stride * height;
839 }
840 r = I420ToI444(y, y_stride, u, u_stride, v, v_stride, dst_sample,
841 dst_sample_stride, dst_u, dst_sample_stride, dst_v,
842 dst_sample_stride, width, height);
843 break;
844 }
845 // Formats not supported - MJPG, biplanar, some rgb formats.
846 default:
847 return -1; // unknown fourcc - return failure code.
848 }
849 return r;
850}
851
852#ifdef __cplusplus
853} // extern "C"
854} // namespace libyuv
855#endif
